title: the spire
content:
good day…  
does anyone know what this font could be?

comments.content:
‘Peignot’.

_( Edit-A-Bit: Sorry, Lex, Your post / reply and all the others didnt show up, due to another one of those beloved Typophile errors. )_

Dav

Yeah, I noticed that as soon as I posted - I wondered why it took so long for Peignot to get identified. We’ll share the ID, Dav.

- Lex
